name: Corpse Golf
description:
EDIT: Decided to do a teenie more stuff with it. Uploaded a new version 9/10 2020

As a fun little sideproject I did this prototype of an alternative golf game. :) 

Click the head of the corpse and drag the mouse to shoot! 
Press ESC to quit, and SPACE to reset to the beginning of the current level. 

At this point there are 4 levels each with a different "theme", and a good bunch of bugs - but it's the fun kind... I promise.. Kinda.. :P 

Enjoy!
